ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Task system
ygData.msgSnippet: The only place that would give me a task was in the Dreadlands, and it sent me ( a 52 Druid) into Chardok for a recon mission.  Thought it couldn t be that
ygData.messageBody:
The only place that would give me a task was in the
Dreadlands, and it sent me ( a 52 Druid) into Chardok
for a recon mission. Thought it couldn't be that bad,
but I had never been to Chardok before. The mission
was to enter the fort inside Chardok and explore the
area around the first bridge. Went in and found the
fort (was invised) opened the door, it squeaks and
every mob in Chardok seems to have heard it, and what
resulted can only be described as Woodelf paste.
--- Wulfric Rennison <wulftech@...> wrote:

> I tried one task. There are 3 Task Masters in POK.
> And I believe at least 1 in every home town. Just
> hail them. They will give you a list of tasks to
> choose from. Rezize your task window to see the
> rewards. These tasks are not easily soloable, but
> if you get a group you can finish them fairly
> quickly. My first task was to collect 4 bone chips
> and kill 10 reanimated mobs in Chardok. It took
> awhile but it was good xp and a 58pp reward.
>
> Raido
>
>
>
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Chris
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Tuesday, September 21, 2004 1:54 PM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Task system
>
>
> I just got Omens of War, and I've been trying to
> find information
> about the new task system. Has anyone here tried
> it out yet? Are the
> tasks easily soloable?
>
> Chris
